name: Coin Thief
description:
Use WASD or Arrow Keys to move

Press P or Z to zoom out, helpful for finding coins

You only have 3 minutes (one cycle for the small hand on the clock) 

You need to collect at least 75% of the coins, then get back to the beginning to successfully escape.

Good luck!

Credits:

Art - Me

Animation - Me

Sound FX - Freesound.org, JFXR, SMW Fortress Clear

Music - Super Mario RPG "Happy Adventure, Delightful Adventure"

Made with GDevelop 5
